fields.name: CustomResourceName
fields.description: Gets the name of the corresponding resource in Kubernetes.

fields.name: FolderPath
fields.description: Gets or sets the folder path of the vm.

fields.name: InstanceUuid
fields.description: Gets or sets the instance uuid of the vm.

fields.name: InventoryItemId
fields.description: Gets or sets the inventory Item ID for the virtual machine.

fields.name: MoName
fields.description: Gets or sets the vCenter Managed Object name for the virtual machine.

fields.name: MoRefId
fields.description: Gets or sets the vCenter MoRef (Managed Object Reference) ID for the virtual machine.

fields.name: SmbiosUuid
fields.description: Gets or sets the SMBIOS UUID of the vm.

fields.name: TemplateId
fields.description: Gets or sets the ARM Id of the template resource to deploy the virtual machine.

fields.name: VCenterId
fields.description: Gets or sets the ARM Id of the vCenter resource in which this resource pool resides.
